title.rendered: Perry Renovation + Toy Deals! + Summer Reading Challenge

content.rendered:
Perry Renovation Progress

We are well underway with our Perry renovation. So much progress in just a couple days! To do this renovation, we have had to close down our Perry store for the month of August. However, our other three locations will be open for business. Stay tuned for more progress. We are very excited about this!

 

Shane and Abbey Gottwals

Our founders, Shane and Abbey Gottwals, LOVE books. (Actually, around here, we all love books). That’s why Gottwals Books and Walls of Books® intend to promote the joy of reading with every book sold!

 

New Toy Deals!

We are offering multiple toy deals right now! Fidget Spinners are now 1 for $6 OR 2 for $10. We also have a Buy-One-Get-One deal on our Fancy Nancy and Goodnight Moon games. Hurry in while supplies last!

 

Summer Reading Challenge

August 4th is the last day to turn in completed Summer Reading Challenge sheets. We were blown away by the amount of participants! The GRAND PRIZE winner will be announced on August 11th. Keep an eye on our Facebook page for more details.
